subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Japan beat the Major League Baseball All-Stars, 4-0, in Tokyo for a three-games-to-none lead in their five-game series. Cano is expected to miss three to four weeks after being hit by a pitch.
snippet: Japan beat the Major League Baseball All-Stars, 4-0, in Tokyo for a three-games-to-none lead in their five-game series. Cano is expected to miss three to four weeks after being hit by a pitch.
